html: Great to see Stevie Gerrard starting so well at Rangers. I’m of the opinion that more club owners should give recently retired players a chance. Can’t wait to watch his team face Celtic this weekend.
text: Great to see Stevie Gerrard starting so well at Rangers. I’m of the opinion that more club owners should give recently retired players a chance. Can’t wait to watch his team face Celtic this weekend.

html: Every week I will randomly choose a winner from all correct entries and they will go into a draw at the end of the season. The prize is 2 hospitality tickets for a home game of a Premier League team chosen by the winner #EPLTotalGoals

html: Get your #EPLTotalGoals entry in before the early kick off tomorrow. Enter by using #EPLTotalGoals and then the total number of goals you think will be scored in all 10 Premier League games played this weekend. My effort is: #EPLTotalGoals 28

html: Congratulations to @marc_thom82 on winning week one of the #EPLTotalgoals competition with 25 goals. No winners last weekend as nobody predicted a very entertaining total of 35 goals!

html: I know it’s business and there’s no room for sentiment but something doesn’t quite feel right when a team wins promotion and then a load of players are signed in most cases to replace last seasons heroes.

html: Congratulations France. They did it the hard way on the tough side of the draw. Half a dozen really special players in that squad. Didn’t feel the result was a true reflection of the game. Croatia did their country proud.
text: Congratulations France. They did it the hard way on the tough side of the draw. Half a dozen really special players in that squad. Didn’t feel the result was a true reflection of the game. Croatia did their country proud.

html: Despite the now obligatory pre tournament scaremongering, it’s been an amazing World Cup. Made even better by a great run from England. All set here in Moscow for the final. I’m going 2-0 to France.
text: Despite the now obligatory pre tournament scaremongering, it’s been an amazing World Cup. Made even better by a great run from England. All set here in Moscow for the final. I’m going 2-0 to France.

html: In response to some of your replies, we all know we need more quality to win a World Cup. The draw was kind to us and the reality is we should have got to the final. But this exciting young team and promising manager captured our imaginations and made the country proud.
text: In response to some of your replies, we all know we need more quality to win a World Cup. The draw was kind to us and the reality is we should have got to the final. But this exciting young team and promising manager captured our imaginations and made the country proud.

html: We’ve scraped past Tunisia in the last minute, beaten a pub team and got beat by the only decent team we’ve faced. Yet the country is convinced we can win The World Cup! And for some reason I’m starting to believe it could just happen too #ComeOnEngland
text: We’ve scraped past Tunisia in the last minute, beaten a pub team and got beat by the only decent team we’ve faced. Yet the country is convinced we can win The World Cup! And for some reason I’m starting to believe it could just happen too #ComeOnEngland

html: My word, our side of the draw is as good as it gets. Will we ever have a better chance of getting to the final? #ComeOnEngland
text: My word, our side of the draw is as good as it gets. Will we ever have a better chance of getting to the final? #ComeOnEngland

html: Unbelievable. I don’t know the stats but despite De Gea being the best GK in the world (IMO), is he as good as Pepe Reina at saving pens? Has Hierro made a mistake not saving a sub to bring Reina on for the shootout?
text:
Unbelievable.
I don’t know the stats but despite De Gea being the best GK in the world (IMO), is he as good as Pepe Reina at saving pens? Has Hierro made a mistake not saving a sub to bring Reina on for the shootout?
